mutants.code:
def find_occurrences(string, substring):
    occurrences = []
    start_index = 1
    while start_index < len(string):
        index = string.find(substring, start_index)
        if index == -1:
            break
        end_index = index + len(substring) - 1
        occurrences.append((index, end_index))
        start_index = index + 1
    return occurrences
